name: SKAL - Prototype 2D Platformer
description:
This is a small hobby project of mine that I've been working on. The name of the project is 'SKAL' and you play as a small orange cube that has to get from point A to point B as fast as possible. Currently there is no 'lose function' other than the player dying, however it is one of the things I'm currently looking into. 

The controls are fairly simple. WASD or the arrow keys to move around. Shift is for sprinting, and Space is for jumping. 

I would love to get some constructive critiscm on the game in order to make it better.

The game runs on the Unity Engine.

PS. Sorry for the sound effects, they might be a little annoying at times due to some bugs. The audio can be turned off in the options menu.
